cards.title: Boss-tacular Birthday!
cards.centerfold: Happy Birthday! Here’s to another year of you pretending to work while we do all the heavy lifting. Remember, age is just a number—like your ‘open door’ policy when you’re in a meeting! Cheers to another year of ‘leading’ us to cake!
cards.back: Wishing you a fantastic year ahead!
cards.artistInspiration: vibrant neo-expressionist style with ornate floral backgrounds and bold color fields
